short_summary: Cleaning supplies and services for Department of National Defence
description: Cleaning supplies and equipment for various offices and buildings, including floor cleaning services, structural exterior cleaning services, cleaning and janitorial services, building cleaning services, and general building and office cleaning and maintenance services.
full_summary:
================ evetextmarkdown
### Government Tender Announcement
#### W6895-230098 Non-Restricted Areas_Janitorial_4 Wings

**Tender Details**
---------------

* **Tender Reference Number**: WS4310500917-Doc4310600777
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Publication Date**: 2024-02-29
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-03-07 T 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-11-01
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None
* **Tender Status**: Cancelled

**Procurement Information**
-------------------------

* **Procurement Category**: SRV
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Products and Services**
-------------------------

* **UNSPSC Codes**:
	+ Cleaning solutions for office equipment (44102912)
	+ Cleaning Equipment and Supplies (47000000)
	+ Janitorial equipment (47120000)
	+ Cleaning and janitorial supplies (47130000)
	+ Floor cleaning services (72101508)
	+ Structural exterior cleaning services (72153500)
	+ Cleaning and janitorial services (76110000)
	+ General building and office cleaning and maintenance services (76111500)
	+ Building cleaning services (76111501)

**Notice**
---------

**Important Amendment to Closing Time**: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 7 May 2024 at 14:00 pm ET. All bids submitted after 7 May 2024 at 14:00 pm ET will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

A mandatory work site visit will be held at Department of National Defence, 4 Wing, Cold Lake, AB T9M 2C6 on 16 April 2024 and 17 April 2024, beginning at 9:00 am MT. Offerors must communicate with the Contracting Authority no later than 14:30 PM MT. April 9, 2024 to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of their representatives.

Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, semi-annual, and annual cleaning tasks and as and when required cleaning services for
